Plan Ahead.effect: Pick a Card from your Deck. Put that Card on top of your Deck.

Quick Draw.effect: Draw 2 Cards. Skip your next Turn.

Sniper.effect: Use any Card in your Deck that deals Damage.

Copycat.effect: Use 1 copy of the Card most previously Played by a target Unit.

Advantage.effect: Draw 1 Card. Instantly Play it without paying its Cost. If you cannot Play the Card, or the Card doesn't have a Cost, Discard the card.

Toll Fee.effect: Add 1 Gear from your Deck to your Hand.

Recycle.effect: Add 1 Card from your Discard pile to your Hand.

Frost Bolt.effect: Halve the targeted Entity's speed the next Turn.

Arcane Trickery.effect: Gain 3 Mana. You Draw 1 less Card at the end of your turn.

Finders Keepers.reward: Add 3 Cards from your Discard pile to your Hand.

Rapid Fire.effect: If possible, attack with the casting Unit's Weapon.

Rattle Bones.effect: Deal 2 Damage extra for every 3 Cards in your Discard pile.

I'm Alive.effect: Return all of your Banished Cards to your Discard pile.

Subvert.effect: Banish all Cards in your Discard pile. Gain 1 Mana for every 2 Cards you Banish using this Card’s effect.

Death and Decay.effect: Roll a 6-sided dice. Discard that many Cards from the top of your Deck and gain that much Mana.

Recruit.reward: All Buildings that summon a Minion instantly summons a Minion.

Deal with the Devil.effect: Discard your Hand. Summon two Units.

Deny.effect: Next time the targeted Unit Plays a card that uses Mana, cancel that effect.

Lightning Strike.effect: Roll a 6-sided dice, add what you rolled to your Damage.

Aim for the weakspot.effect: Deal Damage equal to half of the targeted Unit’s current Health.

Mind Control.effect: Take control of target enemy Entity this turn.

Death Toll.effect: Use a Card from your Discard pile without paying for its Cost.

Rite of Midas.effect: Banish a Card from your Hand. Gain Mana equals to that Card’s Mana cost.

Electromagnetic Pulse.effect: Splash. All damaged Entities cannot Play Cards that require Mana until your next turn.

Tractor Beam.effect: Return a friendly Unit to your Unit deck and remove it from the board.

Mind Flay.effect: Deal damage to an Entity equal to their Power.

Weaken.effect: Reduce the target Entity's Power by 2.

Teleport.effect: Place the casting Entity on any Tile.

Future Sight.effect: Look at the top 3 Cards of your Deck. Pick one and add it to your hand, then shuffle the rest into your Deck. You Draw 1 less Card at the end of your Turn.

Dash.effect: Double the targeted Entity's Speed this turn.

Reality Rift.effect: Swap this Unit's position with another Unit's position.

Laser.effect: 3 Charges. Deals Damage to all Entities in a line between the target and the casting Unit.

Magnetize.effect: Splash 2. You can place any affected Entity anywhere else within the target radius.

Gathering Mind.effect: Add an Elemental Spell Card from your Deck to your Hand.

Portal.effect: Put a Mark on the casting Unit’s feet, and on the targeted Tile. If a Unit steps onto a Mark, they are put on the other Mark.

Holster.effect: This Units Physical Gear have +1 maximum Charge.

Reconstruct.effect: Move the targeted Friendly Building to a new valid location.

Staff of Ice.effect: Any Entity damaged by this Entity has 1 less Speed next turn.

Fangs of Nosferatu.effect: Whenever this Entity deals damage, Heal.

Assassination.reward: Double all your Gear's maximum Charges.

Cold Feet.effect: Affected Entities have 0 Speed the next Turn.

Prominence of Power.effect: Chose a Spell from your Hand. Reveal that card and a Spell with the same name from your Deck and from your Discard Pile. Banish them all and use a copy of the chosen Spell without paying its Resource Cost.

Disarm.effect: Remove 1 Gear from the targeted Entity.

Rebounding Shot.effect: After dealing Damage, you may target another Unit Adjacent to the targeted Entity and use this Spell on it without paying for its Cost. This Spell may only target the same Unit once per turn.

High Energy Shield.effect: Negate all Damage from a Spell.

Reflect.effect: Reflect a Spell that targets the casting Unit back to the Caster. The casting Unit is still affected by the Spell.

Adrenaline Rush.effect: When a Friendly Unit is targeted by a Spell you can Cast this Counter from the targeted Unit. That unit can instantly move up to as many Tiles as it has Speed.
